column3: Man needs, for his happiness, not only the enjoyment of this or that, but hope and enterprise and change.
Neither should a ship rely on one small anchor, nor should life rest on a single hope.
Uncertainty is the refuge of hope.
I place no hope in my strength, nor in my works: but all my confidence is in God my protector, who never abandons those who have put all their hope and thought in him.
Expecting something for nothing is the most popular form of hope.

With optimism, you look upon the sunny side of things. People say, 'Studs, you're an optimist.' I never said I was an optimist. I have hope because what's the alternative to hope? Despair? If you have despair, you might as well put your head in the oven.
We often call a certainty a hope, to bring it luck.
Things start out as hopes and end up as habits.
I always believe things are going to work out.
How disappointment tracks the steps of hope.
Hope is the pillar that holds up the world. Hope is the dream of a waking man.
